text: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver digs into AI slop. It’s the fake generated stuff filling our feeds with content, inevitably leading us to question our existence and whether this internet thing was really all worth it. Watch in its entirety below. Let’s rewind five years and forget this all happened.
html:
Last Week Tonight with John Oliver digs into AI slop. It’s the fake generated stuff filling our feeds with content, inevitably leading us to question our existence and whether this internet thing was really all worth it.

Watch in its entirety below.

Let’s rewind five years and forget this all happened.
